• ⿰ Left to right
    • 區 [ qū ] area, district, region, ward; surname
    • 欠 [ qiàn ] to lack, to owe; to breathe, to yawn
heisig_chinese_memo: Europe lacks any more regions to squeeze countries in. There are so many countries squeezed into a small space already.
Ru_trainchinese: ōu: (сущ/сч.слово) (сокр.) Европа; Оу (фамилия); (физ., сокр.) ом
Kanshudo_mnemonic: there's a lack (欠) of goods in the side open box (區) in Europe
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Europe? Yawn... I've been to every region(country/area)," says Wolverine interviewed from his cardboard box.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " ow " and " zone ", the original meaning is vomiting. "Shuowen": "Spit out. From owe, regional sound." Classics use the original meaning, such as "Shan Hai Jing‧ Overseas North Jing": "The Wild of Ou Si, in the east of the big heel, a woman kneels and rests on the tree Ou Si." Guo Pu's note: "Talking about mulberry and spinning silk." "Han Shu: Biography of Bingji": "Ji Yulijijiu, countless, tasted from Ji, drunk in the car of the prime minister." Yan Shigu's note: " Ou, vomit." The original meaning is also used in scripts and silks, such as "Mawangdui. Yin-Yang Eleven-Pipe Moxibustion Classics, Line 55: "Goodness, Appetite Ou". " Ou " is often expressed with " vomit " after vomiting .

" Ou " can be used as " beat ", which means beating. "Shu Wen Tong Xun Ding Sheng · Need Bu": "Ou, 叚borrowed as a fight." "Han Shu·Zhang Liang Chuan": "Liang stunned, I want Europe." Teacher Gu's Note: "Ou, hit it."

" Ou " is also commonly used as " acura " to mean acura. "Li Shi‧Han Sangong Mountain Stele": "People Ou Ge, I will benefit you." Hong Shi explained: "The stele takes "Ou" as "Ou"."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " ow " and " zone ", the original meaning is vomiting.
humanum_full_description:
從「欠」，「區」聲，本義為嘔吐。《說文》：「吐也。从欠，區聲。」典籍用本義，如《山海經‧海外北經》：「歐絲之野，在大踵東，一女子跪據樹歐絲。」郭璞注：「言噉桑而吐絲。」《漢書‧丙吉傳》：「吉馭吏耆酒，數逋蕩，嘗從吉出，醉歐丞相車上。」顏師古注：「歐，吐也。」簡帛文字也用本義，如《馬王堆．陰陽十一脈灸經甲本》第55行：「善噫，食欲歐」。「歐」作嘔吐義後多用「嘔」表示。

　　「歐」可通作「毆」，表示毆打，《說文通訓定聲‧需部》：「歐，叚借為毆。」《漢書‧張良傳》：「良愕然，欲歐之。」顏師古注：「歐，擊也。」

　　「歐」也通作「謳」，表示謳歌。《隸釋‧漢三公山碑》：「百姓歐歌，得我惠君。」 洪適釋：「碑以『歐』為『謳』。」

Chinese Definition:
Kanshudo mnemonic:there's a lack (欠) of goods in the side open box (區) in Europe
Chinese: Europe lacks any more regions to squeeze countries in. There are so many countries squeezed into a small space already.
Meaning: europe
Hanzi: 欧
Story: Europe? Yawn... I've been to every region(country/area)," says Wolverine interviewed from his cardboard box.
Kind: traditional

從「 欠 」，「 區 」聲，本義為嘔吐。《說文》：「吐也。从欠，區聲。」典籍用本義，如《山海經‧海外北經》：「歐絲之野，在大踵東，一女子跪據樹歐絲。」郭璞注：「言噉桑而吐絲。」《漢書‧丙吉傳》：「吉馭吏耆酒，數逋蕩，嘗從吉出，醉歐丞相車上。」顏師古注：「歐，吐也。」簡帛文字也用本義，如《馬王堆．陰陽十一脈灸經甲本》第55行：「善噫，食欲歐」。「 歐 」作嘔吐義後多用「 嘔 」表示。 「 歐 」可通作「 毆 」，表示毆打，《說文通訓定聲‧需部》：「歐，叚借為毆。」《漢書‧張良傳》：「良愕然，欲歐之。」顏師古注：「歐，擊也。」 「 歐 」也通作「 謳 」，表示謳歌。《隸釋‧漢三公山碑》：「百姓歐歌，得我惠君。」 洪適釋：「碑以『歐』為『謳』。」
From the sound of " ow" and " zone", the original meaning is vomiting. "Shuowen": "Spit out. From owe, regional sound." Classics use the original meaning, such as "Shan Hai Jing‧ Overseas North Jing": "The Wild of Ou Si, in the east of the big heel, a woman kneels and rests on the tree Ou Si." Guo Pu's note: "Talking about mulberry and spinning silk." "Han Shu: Biography of Bingji": "Ji Yulijijiu, countless, tasted from Ji, drunk in the car of the prime minister." Yan Shigu's note: " Ou, vomit." The original meaning is also used in scripts and silks, such as "Mawangdui. Yin-Yang Eleven-Pipe Moxibustion Classics, Line 55: "Goodness, Appetite Ou". " Ou" is often expressed with " vomit" after vomiting. " Ou" can be used as " beat", which means beating. "Shu Wen Tong Xun Ding Sheng · Need Bu": "Ou, 叚borrowed as a fight." "Han Shu·Zhang Liang Chuan": "Liang stunned, I want Europe." Teacher Gu's Note: "Ou, hit it." " Ou" is also commonly used as " acura" to mean acura. "Li Shi‧Han Sangong Mountain Stele": "People Ou Ge, I will benefit you." Hong Shi explained: "The stele takes "Ou" as "Ou"."

歐字的基本解释

歐
ōu
见“欧”。

歐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ǒu］
［《廣韻》烏后切，上厚，影。］
亦作“1”。“欧1”的繁体字。
(1)“嘔”的古字。呕吐。
(2)指呕吐声。
(3)通“毆”。捶击。
[②]［ōu］
［《廣韻》烏侯切，平侯，影。］
“欧2”的繁体字。
(1)通“謳”。歌唱。参见“歐2歌”。
(2)通“謳”。旧指齐地之歌。
(3)同“敺”。“驅”的古字。驱逐。
(4)同“敺”。“驅”的古字。疾行。
(5)通“區”。参见“歐2隅”。
(6)通“甌”。种族名。参见“歐2人”。亦为地名。参见“歐2越”。
(7)欧罗巴洲的简称。参见“歐2人”、“歐2風”。
(8)姓。越王无彊次子蹄封乌程欧馀山之阳，后人以地为氏。参阅宋罗泌《路史·後纪十三下·说》。亦为欧阳、欧冶等复姓的简称。参见“歐2劍”、“歐2母”、“歐2曾”。
(9)欧姆的简称。参见“歐2姆”。

歐字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歐； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页571第27
【玉篇】【集韻】【韻會】於口切【唐韻】烏后切，?音毆。【說文】吐也。或作嘔。【急就篇註】歐逆，吐而不下食也。【前漢·嚴助傳】歐泄，霍亂之病相隨屬。【山海經】薄魚一目，其音如歐。【註】郭璞曰：如人嘔吐聲也。【又】海外歐絲之野，在大踵東有女子跪據樹歐絲。【註】郭璞曰：言噉葉而吐絲，蓋蠶類也。【白氏六帖】跪樹歐絲，生桑得繭。　又與毆通，捶擊也。【史記·留侯世家】良愕然欲歐之。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏侯切，音鷗。與謳同。氣出而歌也。　又歐歐，聲也。【魏繆襲·尤射】雞鳴歐歐，明燈皙皙。皙音制。　又姓。歐冶子，古善鑄劒者，見【越絕書】。又歐侯、歐陽，俱複姓，見【漢書】。　又刀名。【後漢·虞詡傳】寧伏歐刀以示遠近。【註】歐刀，?人之刀也。　又水名。【山海經】滏水東流，注于歐水。　【集韻】或作?㰶??。

歐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
歐字的起名意思

暂无。

Europe
Basic explanation of words
Europe
ōu
See "Europe".
Europe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ǒu]
["Guangyun" Wu after cutting, thick, shadow. ]
Also called "1". Traditional characters for "欧1".
(1) The ancient word "vomit". Vomiting.
(2) Refers to the sound of vomiting.
(3) Through "beating". Thump.
[②] [ōu]
["Guangyun" Wuhou cut, Pinghou, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "欧2".
(1) Through "讴". singing. See "Europe 2 Songs".
(2) Through "讴". The old refers to the song of the earth.
(3) Same as "drive". The ancient word for "drive". Expelled.
(4) Same as "drive". The ancient word for "drive". Swift.
(5) Through the "zone". See "Europe 2 Corner".
(6) Through "Ou". Race name. See "European 2". Also the name of the place. See "European 2 Yue".
(7) The abbreviation for Europa. See "Europe 2 people", "Europe 2 wind".
(8) Last name. The second son of Yue Wang Wuqiang sealed the Yang from Wucheng Ouyu Mountain, and later generations regarded the land as their clan. See Song Luo Mi's "Road History·Hou Ji Thirteenth·Said". It is also the abbreviation of Ouyang and Ouye. See "Ou 2 Sword", "Ou 2 Mother", "Ou 2 Zeng".
(9) Short for Ohm. See "Ou 2m".
Europe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　ou; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 571 27
[Jade articles] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Cut at the mouth [Tang Yun] Cut the black back, and beat the sound. [Said the text] Spit it out. Or nausea. [Anxiety Note] Ou Ni, vomiting without eating. [Previous Han · Yan Zhuan] Ou Xie, cholera accompanied by disease. [Shan Hai Jing] A thin fish at a glance, its sound is like Europe. [Note] Guo Pu said: It's like people vomiting. [Also] In the field of Osi overseas, there is a woman kneeling and taking care of Osi in the east of the big heel. [Note] Guo Pu said: Talking about the leaves and spinning silk, also covers silkworms. [Bai's Six Posts] Kneeling and tree Osi, giving birth to mulberry cocoon.　It is connected with the beating again, and it is also beaten. [Historical Records·Liu Hou Family] Liang was stunned and wanted to Europe.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Wuhouqie, Yinou. Same as Ou. Sing out of anger.　Ouou, sound. [Wei Miaoxi·You She] The cock cries and Ou, the bright light is Xixi. Xi Yinzhi.　Another last name. Ou Yezi, the Gu Shan caster, see [The Book of Yue Jue]. Also Ouhou, Ouyang, Jufu surnames, see [Hanshu].　Also the name of the knife. [Later Han·Yu Xu Biography] Ning Fuou knife to show the distance. [Note] Ou Dao is also a human knife.　Also known as water. [Shan Hai Jing] Fu Shui flows eastward, and it is poured into European water.　【Jiyun】or make? 㰶??.
